website_summaries.verdict: Pet owners with sick or sensitive cats should consider this formula that is praised for providing proven results in most cases.
pros: A gentle formula that is a good choice for cats with sensitive digestive systems
Contains natural ingredients and no fillers
Very few issues getting cats to eat it
cons: On the higher end of the price range
Rare reports of cat owners not seeing a difference

customer_reviews.title: KEEP REFRIGERATED!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've been giving this to my cat for 6 months. I did see some health improvements, but only recently saw the small print on the back the says "KEEP REFRIGERATED"!! Aargh!!! I tend to always look on the front of packaging for items that need refrigeration. So.... I suppose my poor little kitty has not been reaping the true benefits!! Double AARGH!! Anyway....besides my mistake, my cat didn't miss a beat when it was mixed with his food. I will be purchasing a new batch that I will keep refrigerated this time and hopefully see even further improvements. 4 stars is for the poor placement of the Keep Refrigerated verbiage.
customer_reviews.author: Sharee

customer_reviews.title: Great for IBD cat on Prednisolone.
customer_reviews.text: My sweet little cat is unfortunately suffering from IBD. She gets 2,5 mg of Prednisolone in her wet food in a flavored suspension every day to prevent her from vomiting. Curcumin and krill oil are also great natural anti inflammatories that she benefits from. Prednisolone can wreck havoc with healthy bacteria flora in her gut, but this probiotic helps her a lot. She does not seem to take notice when I stir the powder in her pate. Very good product. Remember to keep it in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Scarab

customer_reviews.title: My cat was very sick. Throwing up a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat was very sick. Throwing up a lot and pooping outside her box. She had gotten to the point where she was not eating. Started using probiotics mixed in wet food. She started eating more and more. Started pooping regularly in her box and stopped throwing up. After 2weeks she has been more active and started playing again. This product has transformed my cat's life!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Benfield

customer_reviews.title: Work like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat is about 15 years old. She has always had sensitive stomach and throw up occasionally. Lately, she has been throwing up daily and also has diarrhea a few times a week. Her appetite was affected as well, most likely by nausea. Try this product based on the review. I gave her double dose the first day, mixed it in raw salmon. She ate it without even noticed it there. She stopped throwing up the next day. Stool started to form. On the 3rd day, all vomit/diarrhea had ceased. She no longer grumpy, started to purr and wanted to be pet again. I am grateful that this product work so well and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sang

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats with sensitive stomachs
customer_reviews.text: Great product-mixes well into gravy. Cats can't tell its in food. Works great for cats with sensitive stomachs and quick results!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K

customer_reviews.title: Fix IBS for my Cat
customer_reviews.text: My young cat has IBS I have been trying different Probiotics plus spent over 500.00 with my Vet with no help .After 4 days it seems to be working very well, most others are less quantity cost more.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline osteen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Probiotics for Cats for 15 days. Our cat had severe diarrhea. I sprinkle 1/2 of yellow scoop of Probiotics on a tuna and rice mixture, once a day. She has greatly improved.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Even a finicky cat can't taste the probiotic in his food.
customer_reviews.text: My cat caught a virus that caused all sorts of intestinal problems. After treatment at the vet, he ended up with loose stools. I have been adding the probiotic to his food and in 3 days his stools are almost back to normal. He is a very fussy eater, but the probiotic apparently really doesn't have any taste. He chows down on the wet cat food. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bartlett Pair

customer_reviews.title: No problem getting them to eat it
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 cats and am hoping to curb diarrhea in most of them As you can imagine I can't always be sure who is doing what. The eldest and best loved one, has been diagnosed as having some sort of elder version IBS. I am mixing it into LID wet food. Least Ingredient Diet, which cuts down on allergies. My cats, as a group are fairly picky, and they are having no trouble eating the food with the powder mixed in Results are mixed but it has only been a week. Mostly I see improvement.
customer_reviews.author: A. Merrick Dean

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The label I received looks different from the one featured here, and looks lower budget. I had some leakage along the outer seal when I opened the package. The scoop is extremely shallow and hard to measure. My biggest complaint, though, is the texture. The base of this product is calcium carbonate, which is basically chalk. It has a chalky texture and doesn't mix well into wet food, nor does it coat dry food like previous kitty probiotics I've used. So far, the probiotic itself seems okay, but this also seems like a case of getting what I paid for. I'll be returning to Pet Dophilus or Vital Flora's cat probiotic from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny H.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars*****
customer_reviews.text: 5 STARS My cat is not having any trouble eating and it's helping her with her bathroom issues. ( I was worried about her not eating it because she is kind of a diva. ) So far we are enjoying your products! Great Product, Great Price, Great quantity! QUALITY! Maybe revisit the cartoonish cat on the logo! People may not purchase for this reason, it cheapens the product. I was using a purinas fortaflora which helped but was expensive for the quantity! P.S. Make sure to REFRIGERATE this product and do some digging for your little scoop in the container!
customer_reviews.author: Spiderwebbzzz

customer_reviews.title: My cats diarrhea has improved with this.
customer_reviews.text: I had read a review on a cat page that this was good for cats that needed probiotics and that it didn’t seem to make their diarrhea worse. I have a foster cat who has bad diarrhea, so that was important. I’ve been giving her this for a week, and her diarrhea has improved. It’s not totally gone yet, but nothing else we tried (including what the vet gave us) helped. I’m satisfied with this product and would recommend it to anyone with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: KC shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sammy the cat approves!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My 16 year old cat "Sammy" was diagnosed with Feline Colitis and did not respond to any of the med's prescribed for him. I have been trying different products in desperation! So far, this has been the 'fix' to help with his health issues. I like that it is a great amount, stronger, and kept in the refrigerator. My Sammy has a better appetite and seems perkier...will keep using this!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Slack

customer_reviews.title: Keep your cat healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I run Karma Kat Cafe, where we have about 12 resident cats at a time, waiting for adoption. We use this probiotic supplement daily, to reduce any digestive issues, that often come with rescue cats. All of the cats readily eat their food, so obviously the flavor of this product is acceptable. It is a great value, easy to administer and the cats look healthier since starting the probiotic. No toilet issues, and we will definitely continue using this product in our rescue.
customer_reviews.author: Mystie

customer_reviews.title: Kitty-approved, economical, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to support the health of my aging diabetic cat. Too soon for any dramatic results, but then I'm not really expecting any. I'm not solving a digestive crisis, just hoping to boost overall health. After some initial experimentation, it seems this product is kitty-approved. Much more economical than Forti Flora. Great customer service. The jar will probably last for my cat's lifetime (tip to Doggone: also make a smaller jar!), but if it runs out, I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: svw

customer_reviews.title: Does it help? Not sure but inexpensive insurance.
customer_reviews.text: We decided to try this after our vet sold us some for our aging cat. The vet stuff seemed to help and I think this did too. With an old, chronically ill cat it is hard to tell if it is helping or not but we figured it could not hurt. Have not noticed any difference in her but we will keep using the product until she passes because it might. Reasonably priced, well packaged. My wife thinks that since it is for cats the scoop should be the correct size for a cats dosage but 1/2 scoop works fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Made two out of my three cats violently ill.
customer_reviews.text: Within two days of using this product, one of my cats began projectile vomiting and another had explosive diarrhea. The third was not affected. I cannot in good conscience recommend anyone feed this poison to their cats.
customer_reviews.author: shardborn

customer_reviews.title: so good. I have a geriatric cat that is vomiting ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have a geriatric cat that is vomiting regularly and has skin issues (pulls his fur out). He is VERY picky about what he eats, so pills or treats don't work at all He noticed something different and wouldn't eat with this product on it, but started to the third time in. He has had it only twice now, but both times didn't vomit the whole day! That is a miracle! I am encouraged and will keep using this product, I'll let you know how the long run goes.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Great for foster kittens
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for the foster kittens that I care for. I usually have a new litter every couple of months. And they almost always end up with a URI. Which means they end up with runny stools. This product has been amazing with the kittens I currently have. They had diarrhea when I first got them. So I started giving them the probiotics and saw relief very quickly and now one is on antibiotics for a cold. She hasn't had the usual diarrhea and she seems to be recovering faster, possibly because of not having that nasty side effect. I mix it in canned food every morning and they gobble it up.
customer_reviews.author: SandraD

customer_reviews.title: The dosage on the jar is not correct. It clearly states 1 scoop.
customer_reviews.text: The dosage on the jar is not correct. It clearly states 1 scoop. When you read the full product description on Amazon the recommended dose is 1/2 scoop. Yes this will create problems with your cats digestive tract everything from vomiting to diarrhea occur with the overdose. I learned the hard way with my cat hopefully the manufacturer will change the label to reflect the proper dose. I contributed to causing her IBS for several months .... poor kitty !
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Tiseo

customer_reviews.title: Contains sugar - be careful
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It has helped my cats. Three stars because I didn't realize it has sugar which I cannot give to my diabetic kitty. Also, disappointed it doesn't also contain prebiotics. Overall I would recommend this to anyone looking to improve GI function and health in their cats. However, I would watch blood sugar levels when using.
customer_reviews.author: Kara R.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not notice this helping SAXTON at all. He told me try another company.
customer_reviews.author: M Richee

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is having urinary problems, peeing out of box .... this seems to be helping. Only thing I think is crazy, is that they say put half a scoop in their food..."the scoop is small" so getting half a scoop is not an exact amount.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper girl

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend! I have two older cats and the male ...
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend! I have two older cats and the male has been having major stomach issues including vomiting and constant diarrhea. Since giving them this in their food, it has almost completely solved his issues. It's amazing. I was able to mix with both wet and dry cat food too.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany O

customer_reviews.title: My hope was that this product would help with diaheria ...
customer_reviews.text: My hope was that this product would help with diaheria and smell of he feces. I have 4 cats and the product didn't work. One if my cats had dandruff and it is gone. I don't know if it was a result of this product. I will continue to use it with the hope it will help after using it for a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Wach

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My cat has a very senesitive stomach and had stomach issue for months. Decided to try a little bit more expensive probiotic and I’m glad I did! I give her 1/8 tsp everyday with her wet food and in less than two weeks started to see a difference in her stool. I went from runny loose stool to firm! This will last me months and is worth the price. Only problem I have with it is how sticky the outside of the container is. Even after washing it with soap and water it’s still a bit sticky. But it’s just the powder that causes it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: They actually eat it! I sprinkle on at one meal a day and the eat it right up. Fairly new so no major changes to report. I am a hugh believer in probiotics for health. For me and the fur kids. Thanks for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: lsk33410

customer_reviews.title: Good Cat Health
customer_reviews.text: I had a very sick cat with intestinal problems . He is doing much better now . I decided to start him on a regiment of Probiotics and he is thriving . His vet said it was the best thing I could do for him . Great product and now , all of my cats are on probiotics to insure good intestinal health. Will be buying this product again . Best thing anyone can do for their cats health .
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Landy

customer_reviews.title: The first time i purchased this was better than this time even the jar is smaller
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed product was unsealed and open powder was everywhere hopefully the return and exchange will be better would not use an open product for my pet the jar was also smaller than the last fir the same price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doggone Best Products Priobiotics for Cats....
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to gage if this product is actually doing anything, you know I hope it is actual probiotics for the cats have been on antibiotics & need probiotics, but it's sad we don't have an obvious way to tell if something is actually what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Night of Starz

customer_reviews.title: So far, working just as well as the overpriced Fortiflora!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have been getting this for a little over a month now, sprinkled on their food once a day, they have no problem with it. It seems to be working just as well as the ridiculously overpriced Purina Fortiflora they've been getting for the past year on the advice of the vet. When I ordered in December, though, it was $18.62, so I guess I got a great deal since it seems to be substantially higher-priced now. Will probably still re-order when this is gone, although I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the probiotics for my cat for about a week now. He does not notice that it is in his food which is canned wet. I have been using other probiotics for cats for several years now and decided to change brands since the others were much more costly and had the same ingredients. Easy to use just follow instructions on jar. At this time seem to be well tolerate with no adverse effects.
customer_reviews.author: DR ZEN

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat with IBS and my vet recommended a probiotic. This one had phenomenal reviews so I gave it shot. I gave it to my cat for over a month and there wasn't a change in her stool at all. Unfortunately it's too late to return it, because it didn't do a thing
customer_reviews.author: John F. Peters

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is refrigerated
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for two weeks. Two senior cats with digestive issues. I am seeing results. Has helped their diarrhea, and vomiting. They have no problem eating the powder in their food. I like that it is refrigerated. I use it twice a day. They were previously on another product for six months, it never helped, This product, Has already shown great Improvement.
customer_reviews.author: BobR

customer_reviews.title: Five-star product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My cat has been taking this with her morning meal for almost a month now, and I'm seeing a significant difference in her energy level, her eating and elimination habits, and especially in the neatness of her litter box deposits. Also she had been vomiting two or three times a week prior to starting with the probiotic. That has altogether stopped. Very happy with this product and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C.T. Vine

customer_reviews.title: It Helps
customer_reviews.text: My cat Kami has gas and it's BAD! This has helped to cut down on the out gassing and has helped to make his stool firmer.
customer_reviews.author: dlc

customer_reviews.title: EVEN FINICKY KITTIES LIKE IT!
customer_reviews.text: The taste. I have a very finicky autoimmune 1 year old kitten. Probiotic is vital. In the past, I've had to give her small doses throughout the day and bury it in her food. But she LOVES Probiotics for Cats. I can give it to her all at once and just put a little topper of her food on top. We use it at our animal rescue medical unit, every kitty, in their wet food. So I know it's good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqui A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!😀
customer_reviews.text: It made my cat stop throwing up and he can hold his food down now. Deducted a star for: it did not help him defecate, so I still have to use the MiraLAX in his food everyday. At least he is putting on weight and retaing his nutrients now.😀
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Lavold

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my 3 babies have extremely sensitive stomachs and vomited after being given this. They are now on a completely different diet but my recommendation is Purina probiotic if you have sensitive stomach babies.
customer_reviews.author: jayne

customer_reviews.title: happy kitty tummies are worth it
customer_reviews.text: I laugh that I am giving my cats a probiotic when I don't even take one myself . . . but happy kitty tummies are worth it. The scoop is super tiny, so this will last quite a while and they eat it with their food with no problem, so whew!
customer_reviews.author: Steph F

customer_reviews.title: I have one senior cat with tummy issues and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one senior cat with tummy issues and this really has helped. Without it he is prone to explosive diarrhea (sorry but it's true). When I add this to his food his stool is much firmer (and quieter).
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This really is Doggone Best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many probiotics over the last year for my 12 year old cat to help with his diarrhea and Doggone Best has come thru with flying colors....this stuff really works......Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Gato Grande

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue male Cecil was vomiting and have loose stool periodically, we think he may have pancreatitis flare ups because it is so random. I have been including Doggone Best Products Cat Probiotics in his daily portion of wet food and he is responding very well. He hasn’t been lethargic, litter box habits are good and no vomiting on the couch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that seems to work on our 11 year old cat with digestive issues. He's back to his playful self and gaining weight!! It must be flavorless because he's pretty picky and doesn't notice it's added to his canned food.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Cats
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my feral cats ,have a small kitten (Peanut) and I didn't think he would make it ,feed him this and he is showing alot of improvement, will but again
customer_reviews.author: Karla Derenne

customer_reviews.title: Helpful perhaps
customer_reviews.text: Probiotics are necessary for cats with irritable bowel disorder as my ex-show cat has. For him, 100% raw diet has made all the difference. Not sure what difference this probiotic is making. Since it's a drag on my budget, I may drop it and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Lori722

customer_reviews.title: I take their soft food that I give them in the evening and add a little water and then stir it up and add the food so it is like
customer_reviews.text: I just started giving it to my two cats over the last two weeks so it is hard to see change. But I had a sick cat last summer who had surgery and he is the one that it will be most noticeable for. I have no problem giving it to them. I take their soft food that I give them in the evening and add a little water and then stir it up and add the food so it is like an oatmeal texture. I give it to both cats because it is hard to separate them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mears

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Granted, I have only given my household of cats - most of which have had nasty poo lately - two doses of this, I have already noticed a difference in their output. The worst afflicted would have a rumbly tummy after eating, and that's completely gone. Just guessing based on my own physiology, but that seems like a good sign to me. Will continue to use and hope to get all of the furry ones sorted. Guessing that a recent round of antibiotics got them all out of whack.
customer_reviews.author: sbg

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: I tried it for 3 weeks and my cat continued to throw up. Did not help him at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My cat typically is very finicky about what he will eat, but loved this.
customer_reviews.author: learning artist

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Things are not quite as bad when it comes time to clean the potty. This stuff seems to control diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: John Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help my cats system
customer_reviews.text: One of our cats has a very sensitive stomach and if he is on probiotics he does so much better with food. This product is great for him. He has gained weight and has more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Dina fehler

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I am using it for my cat ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I am using it for my cat with skin allergies and I am hoping it works for her. I am sure it will probiotics are great for people and for animals. I will keep her on it. It will be good for her.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I can't say whether it's a terrific product or not to be honest
customer_reviews.text: I can't say whether it's a terrific product or not to be honest. Turns out, my cat has lymphoma and everything I give him in the probiotic world makes him sick. I will give it a try with one of my other cats, but right now I'm too focused on my little one to think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C.

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: Best probiotic I have used for my cats. Makes a difference in frequency of loose stools.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible service for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: The probiotic arrived less than 48 hours after ordering. Easy to administer and our cat eats on lightly moistened dry food with no problem. Hoping b/n antibiotics and probiotic that we can get some weight back on our beloved feline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she likes it!
customer_reviews.text: cat likes it. that's saying a lot, as successive medical treatments wrecked her digestion. itchy skin & lip lesion a little better. only 3 weeks in, so I'm waiting a bit longer for a full report.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: This has solved my three cat's digestive issues. When ...
customer_reviews.text: This has solved my three cat's digestive issues. When I mix it in their food they don't even seem to know its in there.
customer_reviews.author: KLB

customer_reviews.title: ... cat has always had digestive issues and the vet recommended to put him on a probiotic
customer_reviews.text: My one cat has always had digestive issues and the vet recommended to put him on a probiotic. I think this probiotic works wonders for him and his diarrhea! I am now giving it to my other two cats as protection for there digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping sensitive tummy issues
customer_reviews.text: I have not been using long enough to say that I love it, but I think I'm seeing improvement so I'm encouraged. I assume it has no taste and I hide it in wet food. The only suggestion I would make is that if it could taste fishy so that it would be appealing on dry food or not need to be stirred in and hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Meme B

customer_reviews.title: All 6 of our cats are using this, no ...
customer_reviews.text: All 6 of our cats are using this, no problem with them detecting it in their food. Just using it for general health of five but my male Bengal has tummy troubles and I'm waiting to see if this will help him.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: My cats were having none of this!
customer_reviews.text: This product sounds great and seems to work for many other cats. It is tasteless and odorless but that wasn't going to fool my cat. I sprinkled on top, mixed in wet food, only using half the dose. Even put it on my other cat's plate, then neither cat would eat their food. Not sure how they know it's there. Frustrating! !
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I will keep buying
customer_reviews.text: This is a really really good company for probiotics. Their service is excellent and their product is too. I got the dog version but it actually works for cats as well. I have just started using this so I haven't seen much yet but I am feeling that I will see some good results. My cat has diarrhea and itchy skin so this should help her within a few days. I totally recommend this to anyone with a cat (they don't even need to be sick).
customer_reviews.author: amina

customer_reviews.title: Just works!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 cats and all but one did not notice the probiotic mixed in then food.. It helped with the bowls not being loose and stinky anymore within less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Working for my kitty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mix into my cat's wet food. He doesn't seem to know it there. His tummy problems seem to have improved in just a short time. Will continue to use! Pleased with the product and the quick shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Annodal

customer_reviews.title: and probiotics always better then drug
customer_reviews.text: after month my cat don't have any trouble with diarrhea, it's really help. and probiotics always better then drug, naturally support immune system.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was having very strong smelling diarrhea and after a few days of using this product she was back to normal! The packaging is small enough to fit on the door in my fridge and the scoop is easy to use. You get a lot of the powder for the price you pay. Overall I am very happy with my purchase and I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Added to kittens wet food and KMR milk. Worked out well. Giving to my adult cats also on dry food.
customer_reviews.author: gerald

customer_reviews.title: Both cats dislike the taste of the product on their food and ...
customer_reviews.text: Both cats dislike the taste of the product on their food and will eat only because there is nothing else for them to eat. Neither has turned her nose up like they do now. Wish it was different as one has had digestive issues and I was hoping the probiotics would help.
customer_reviews.author: Geralyn L.

customer_reviews.title: This is the first probiotic that helped my cat with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first probiotic that helped my cat with diarrhea. The probiotic I received from my Vet didn't help, so I'm very grateful for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Turney

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: I have three kitties with some tummy issues. Two of them are over 20 yrs old.This product was very easy to mix in with their wet food.It firmed up their stool by about 50 percent.Mary Miles, cat lover:-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think there is an improvement in my cat's digestive ...
customer_reviews.text: I think there is an improvement in my cat's digestive health. She doesn't fuss over eating the probiotic...licks it off the food first.Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My cats don't even notice it's in there food. And my one cat has stopped vomiting since he started taking this.
customer_reviews.author: Roseinwinter

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's in this stuff but my previously finicky cat will eat anything I mix it with or sprinkle on top of....my vet recommended this and it is the BOMB! update: I've been using for two weeks now and my cat has stopped vomiting all over my house. I highly recommend for any one whose cat has digestive issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Maycann

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 10 stars, I would! My cat had watery stools from a 30-day long course of antibiotics, and after a month they still hadn't changed. Less than two weeks of these probiotics had him totally back to normal. Absolutely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My cat had diarrhea for a long time. This stuff really worked for him. Would recommend it to anyone 😊

customer_reviews.text: It mixes quickly in wet food. Though it must be refrigerated it does not clump. My cat gets this each evening and has very regular and normal BMs.

customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle this on iams dry food along with lysine, then put a bit of water over it to dampen and stir to mix it all together. Seems to help with their feline herpes immune system issues.
customer_reviews.author: Situational Awareness

customer_reviews.title: Miracle
customer_reviews.text: I have been having to give one of my cats lactulose daily to prevent constipation. Since I have found this 2 weeks ago, I have been able to decrease his dose by half! I hope to be able to get him off of the lactulose eventually! Additionally, since I have started mixing this in with my cats' food, whichever one of my 3 has had occasional diarrhea has not had any more diarrhea. This product is great for preventing constipation and diarrhea!

customer_reviews.text: I had read that this product is the same product that gives dry food its appeal to cats. In trying to transition my cats from dry food to wet food, I decided to try out this powder as a supplement to the wet food. It didn't really help the cats transition.

product_meta.title: Doggone Best Products Cat Probiotics
product_meta.description:
Your search for the best, most effective probiotic is finally over! When you order from us today, here are just a few of the benefits that you can look forward to: 

→Our ultra concentrated probiotic will help keep your cat's GI tract in the best health possible. Our precise blend of L.Acidophilus, L.Plantarum, and L.Salivarius will fight off internal infections, diarrhea, an upset stomach, and restore their digestive system to its proper state after taking antibiotics and/or antifungals. Give back the health and overall vitality that your furry friend deserves.

→With no added fillers or "binders" to hold a tablet supplement together, our specially-formulated powder does not contain any unnecessary ingredients. We only pack our probiotic with over 1 Billion CFUs/serving, which is far more than any of the leading competitors.

→Our probiotic has so many more benefits aside from a healthy digestive system. It helps with allergies and skin irritation as well. Excessive shedding and itching will be an issue of the past. Keep your kitty's comfort at the forefront with a steady regimen of our powerful probiotic.

Keep in mind what we offer isn't a miracle drug, but an all natural supplement that seems to work extremely well on your cat.

When you order today, remember you are ordering with the confidence of our 60-day 100% No-Questions-Asked refund, if you are not completely satisfied with your purchase. Your cat's health and happiness is, and will always be, our #1 priority

Recommended Use: For all cat breeds over 8 weeks old, 1/2 scoop(scoop provided) added to food once daily or as needed.

Copyright Superior Quality Products. Sold Exclusively by Superior Quality Products and its Authorized Dealers
